tileset = "sandcave";
area = "sandcave3";
areaname = "Sandflow Caves";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "sandcave";
A_sprites = [{name:"Red Gate",model:"object",x:45,y:11,type:"switch_gate",colour:"ruby",conv:[["","It\'s a large, ornate golden door. There\'s a large ruby set in the centre, glowing faintly."]]},{name:"Blue Keystone",model:"object",x:38,y:44,type:"switch_orb",colour:"sapphire",base:"gold",conv_action:1},{name:"A",model:"area_transition",x:0,y:4,dest:["sandcave4",48,45],ARROW:"W"},{name:"B",model:"area_transition",x:7,y:0,dest:["sandcave5",9,48],ARROW:"N"},{name:"C",model:"area_transition",x:25,y:0,dest:["sandcave5",30,48],ARROW:"N"},{name:"D",model:"area_transition",x:49,y:3,dest:["sandcave6",1,45],ARROW:"E"},{name:"EXIT",model:"area_transition",x:24,y:48,dest:["sandcave2",3,2],ARROW:"S"}];
if(!GameData.plotVars.CH3SQ3[1].Hessark)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Reptoid Warrior Hessark",model:"reptoid_warrior",x:42,y:24,walkspeed:40,dir:"n",elem:"EARTH",conv:"c_ch3sq3"});
}
areaLoot = [{x:12,y:34,amount:4,item:"BetterPotion"},{x:14,y:35,amount:1,item:"Remedy"},{x:14,y:27,amount:1,item:"Really Cold Water"},{x:25,y:17,amount:1,item:"PhoenixDown"},{x:20,y:14,amount:1,item:"BloodOpal"},{x:25,y:15,amount:1,item:"Human Skull",hidden:1}];
foes = MONSTER_TABLES.SANDCAVE;
btlChance = 3;
